entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
